{{ quote.id }} {{ quote.quote }} {{ quote.author}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { QuoteService } from 'src/app/services/quote.service'; import { Quote } from 'src/app/shared/models/Quotes'; @Component({ selector: 'app-quote-page', templateUrl: './quote-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./quote-page.component.css'] }) export class QuotePageComponent implements OnInit{ quotes!: Quote[]; constructor(private quoteService:QuoteService){ } ngOnInit(){ this.quoteService.findAll().subscribe(data =>{ this.quotes=data; }); } }
